summary: I RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF RECALL INVOLVING THE PASSENGER SIDE AIRBAG IN JULY OF 2016. YOUR SITE SHOWS ME THAT THE REPAIR IS STILL NOT AVAILABLE, ALMOST A YEAR LATER. SO I AM DRIVING IN A CAR AND MY PASSENGER, USUALLY MY WIFE, IS NOT AS SAFE AS SHE SHOULD BE. I FIND THIS TO BE A SERIOUS PROBLEM. CAN YOU HELP REMEDY THE SITUATION?
